properties.name: fon4food.email-from-noreply
properties.description: Mail sender if no replies wanted

properties.name: fon4food.create-test-vendors
properties.description: Comma-separated list of test users (email addresses) to create with vendor role

properties.name: fon4food.create-test-suppliers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of test users (email addresses) to create with supplier role

properties.name: fon4food.privacy-policy
properties.description: Path to the file containing the privacy policy

properties.name: fon4food.token-expire-days
properties.description: Days after which a confirmation token expires
